name: @sassy-js/fire
description: Sassy Fire is a powerful library of tools designed to help you build sleek and stylish applications with Firebase. With Sassy Fire, you can create dynamic, scalable, and performant apps that are sure to impress your users.

scripts.release:migrate: cp package.json LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.md CONTRIBUTING.md dist
scripts.release:version: npx changeset version && pnpm run release:migrate
scripts.release:prepare: pnpm run build && pnpm run release:version
scripts.release: pnpm run release:prepare && cd dist && pnpm publish --access=public
